trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP fault when SOAP version 1.2 is used to communicate between a client and an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 선택적의 내용을 나타냅니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""> </xref> SOAP 버전 1.2 XML 웹 서비스와 클라이언트 간의 통신에 사용 되는 경우 SOAP 오류에 대 한 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP 1.2 fault contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.2 오류를 포함 한 `Code` 요소와 선택적 `Subcode` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: `Code` 요소 반면 제한 된 수의 SOAP 프로토콜에 의해 지정 된 미리 정의 된 오류 코드를 사용 하 여 발생 한 오류 형식을 지정 하는 `Subcode` 요소를 사용 하면 응용 프로그램이 특정 오류 코드를 제공 하는 SOAP 오류 보낸 사람입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 콘텐츠를 나타내는 `Subcode` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services return a SOAP fault by throwing a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> and.NET clients receive a SOAP fault by catching a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>사용 클라이언트에 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> catch 하 여 SOAP 오류를 수신</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> 하 여 SOAP 오류를 반환 하는 XML 웹 서비스

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> has the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property representing the `Code` element and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property representing the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>에 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>속성을 나타내는 `Code` 요소 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>속성을 나타내는 `Subcode` 요소.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> class sets the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>응용 프로그램별 오류 코드를 설정 하는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>응용 프로그램별 오류 코드를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> class setting the application specific error code and additional error information.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> 응용 프로그램별 오류 코드 및 추가 오류 정보를 설정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>응용 프로그램별 오류 코드를 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> specifying additional application specific error information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> 추가 응용 프로그램 관련 오류 정보를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the application specific error code in the form of an XML qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 된 XML 이름 형식의 응용 프로그램별 오류 코드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 생성자를 사용 하 여 설정 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A> property can be any user defined XML qualified name, including the codes represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>속성에는 모든 사용자 정의 XML 정규화 된 이름으로 표시 하는 코드가 포함 될 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode>필드.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> representing the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>응용 프로그램별 오류 코드를 나타내는.</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional error information contained within a child <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 자식 내에 포함 된 추가 오류 정보를 가져옵니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Subcode" name="Subcode" href=""> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 생성자를 사용 하 여 설정 하는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A> property allows an XML Web service to provide nested error information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>속성을 사용 하면 중첩 된 오류 정보를 제공 하는 XML 웹 서비스.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Subcode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for providing an error code specific to the XML Web service while passing along error information returned from components the XML Web service called.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스 호출 하는 구성 요소에서 반환 된 오류 정보에 따라 전달 되는 동안에 XML 웹 서비스에 특정 오류 코드를 제공 하는 데 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> containing additional error information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>추가 오류 정보가 포함 된.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>
